properties.description: Master pipeline to extract the data from snowflake, convert it to desired XML format and then post it to OTM endpoint.

activities.name: LU-Orchestration_Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to orchestration_metadata(parameter_json) process.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}' and  active_ind  ='y'

activities.name: EP-SnowFlakeExctraction
activities.description: This activity is to execute a generic pipeline (PL_KHCDE_GENERIC_SnowflakeExtraction) to extract the data from snowflake to our blob in CSV format.

activities.name: LU-Enggextract_Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_enggextract_metadata where application_name= '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: EP-PythonScript
activities.description: This activity is to execute the PL_KHCDE_SUB_LWA_AUTOMATION_PYTHON_PROCESSING sub pipeline which is designed to run python script on docker containers to convert the csv data in required xml format.

activities.name: LU-XML_Body
activities.description: This activity pull the data from the newly generate excel file to use as body in the next webactivity.

activities.name: ForEachValue
activities.description: To run a for each for all the records fetched in the previous activity.

activities.name: SetEach_XMLBodyAsVariable
activities.description: Value of each cell from the excel file will be stored in a variable.

activities.name: PostToOTMEndpoint
activities.description: Webactivity using SHIR to post the data to OTM endpoint which is hosted on premise.

activities.name: Fail Pipeline
activities.description: This activity calls a dummy fail activity. In case, webactivity is able to connect but due to invalid data, its not able to post the data. For that, we have IF condition. If the data is successfully posted to the endpoint, we will get a ReferenceTransmissionNo in the response. If we don't get this ReferenceTransmissionNo, then its supposed that the transmission has failed, and then we will execute the fail dummy activity.

ifFalseActivities.name: Fail Dummy Activity
ifFalseActivities.description: A fail dummy activity, in case the transmission to the endpoint is not successful, it will run to show a failed status.

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed10
activities.description: This activity will add a failure entry in audit table, if activity fails to connect to OTM endpoint.

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart_Master
activities.description: Stored Procedure to insert pipeline start record

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed01
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed02
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed04
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed06
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineSuccess03
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineSuccess04
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step

activities.name: SP-PipelineEnd_Master
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of complete pipeline.

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed11
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of complete pipeline.

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineSuccess02
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step

activities.name: set_env_variable
activities.description: Set the variable - ENV from global parameters - AZURE_ENV

activities.name: Get_API_URL
activities.description: Get API URL stored in KV depending upon the environment.

activities.name: Get_API_Access_Id
activities.description: Get Access token for the API pull

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed07
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed08
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineSuccess06
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step

activities.name: FE_LWA_AUTOMATION_FOLDER
activities.description: This activity removes each extract_blob_location folder from logisitcs folder.

activities.name: GM_LWA_AUTOMATION_FOLDER
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of extract_blob_location.

activities.name: IF_LWA_AUTOMATION_FOLDER_EXISTS
activities.description: This activity checks if extract_blob_location folder exists or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: DL_LWA_AUTOMATION_FOLDER
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the extract_blob_location from logistics folder.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_FileDelete
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step i.e. old files got deleted from blob.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivityError_FileDelete
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of previous step i.e. old files didn't get delete from blob.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_For_Folder_Check
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step i.e. old files got deleted from blob.

activities.name: SP-ActivityError_If_Folder_Check
activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of previous step i.e. failed to check if the folder exists or not.

activities.description: Stored Procedure to log error of failure of previous step

activities.description: Stored Procedure to log success of previous step
